last_episode_to_air.name: World War Tree - Earth Day Special

name: Supermansion
overview: Aging superhero, Titanium Rex, and his has-been team known as The League of Freedom struggle to stay relevant in a changing world.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: A group of irrelevant superheroes struggle to remain significant in the modern era.

episodes.name: Groaner's Wild
episodes.overview: The League of Freedom damages a national monument and gets called before Congress and investigated by a military accountant and Black Saturn has a showdown with his nemesis, the Groaner.

episodes.name: They Shoot Omega Pets, Don't They?
episodes.overview: An old colleague of Titanium Rex is found dead and the League of Freedom care for his orphaned pets while investigating the mysterious death.

episodes.name: Letâ€™s Talk About Rex
episodes.overview: Titanium Rex has an embarrassing encounter with the interstellar super villain Blazar and has to save his public image. Elsewhere: Black Saturn tries to find out who is eating his food and Brad tries to take advantage of Cooch.

episodes.name: A Shop in The Dark
episodes.overview: American Ranger's former sidekick and current Secretary of Defense Kid Victory joins the League for dinner; Rex tries to get more funding; Ranger struggles with Kid Victory's lifestyle; and the rest of the League goes grocery shopping.

episodes.name: Puss in Books
episodes.overview: Sgt. Agony discovers Cooch is illiterate and the League of Freedom helps her prepare for the GED. Also: American Ranger searches for the American dream and Jewbot wants to be an inspirational influence.

episodes.name: Lex
episodes.overview: Lex Lightning shows up on Titanium Rex's doorstep and claims to be his illegitimate daughter. Also: Rex grapples with fatherhood and American Ranger, Black Saturn, and Brad start a rock band to impress Lex.

episodes.name: A Midsummer Night's Ream
episodes.overview: Black Saturn starts dating after a cat burglar breaks his heart; and Rex, Ranger and Brad try a sadistic new workout regimen with personal trainer Johnny Rabdo. Meanwhile, Lex tries to get on Cooch's good side as Jewbot struggles with gender identity.

episodes.name: Brad Medicine
episodes.overview: Brad's nefarious origins are revealed as his past catches up with him; and the rest of the League looks for an escape from Titanium Rex's game night. Meanwhile, American Ranger discovers the joys of the modern internet.

episodes.name: Unfortunate Son
episodes.overview: Black Saturn is cut off financially and confronts his rich parents then involves Lex in a bid to restart his allowance; and Jewbot explores the life of a caregiver. Meanwhile, Titanium Rex attempts to cancel the mansion's cable subscription.

episodes.name: Babes in the Wood
episodes.overview: Rex and Ranger's camping trip doesn't go as planned when the rest of the League tags along; Rex waits for the perfect time to reveal a secret to Ranger; Saturn hides his relationship with Lex; Jewbot goes offline; and Cooch doesn't do well in nature.

episodes.name: The Inconceivable Escape of Dr. Devizo
episodes.overview: The League of Freedom prepares for the worst as Dr. Devizo plans his escape from the mansion's underground prison; Rex attempts to match wits with Devizo; Black Saturn goes undercover; and American Ranger seeks retribution for Gloria's betrayal.

episodes.name: Lexanity
episodes.overview: Billionaire defense contractor Ivan Whiff tries to lure Lex away from the League. Meanwhile, Jewbot administers routine physicals for the League, causing Ranger to disavow modern medicine and Brad to discover he may be allergic to Cooch.

episodes.name: Lex as a Weapon
episodes.overview: In the Season 1 finale, Dr. Devizo orchestrates a jailbreak of the League's most dangerous villains; Rex's past comes back to haunt him; and the League's worst fears are realized.

episodes.name: Virtual Reality Bites
episodes.overview: In the Season 2 premiere, the League of Freedom is still reeling following the destruction of the SuperMansion, as all the villains roam freely throughout Storm City. Meanwhile, American Ranger helps Cooch cope with Brad's death; and Titanium Rex and Jewbot team up to prevent a cult from leaking sensitive intel.

episodes.name: School Me Once
episodes.overview: Titanium Rex tries to persuade an old friend into joining the League in hopes of restoring their tarnished reputation. Meanwhile, Black Saturn introduces Jewbot to fraternity life; and the rest of the League experience college for themselves.

episodes.name: The League of Cheesedom
episodes.overview: Portia Jones makes plans to open a pizzeria and arcade based on the League in hopes of restoring their reputation. Meanwhile, Jewbot learns about his past and undergoes an existential crisis.

episodes.name: I Didn't Even Have to Use My J.K.
episodes.overview: J.K. Simmons follows Titanium Rex around in hopes of playing him in a movie about the League. Meanwhile, the recently-escaped villains form their own group, the Injustice Club.

episodes.name: Black to the Future
episodes.overview: A Black Saturn from the future travels to Storm City in hopes of stopping an event that will trigger the apocalypse.

episodes.name: Blazarmageddon
episodes.overview: The League is called upon to stop an enormous space alien from obliterating planet Earth. With the help of NASA, the League embarks on their mission, but Rex and team prove dangerously ill-suited for the stresses of space travel.

episodes.name: The Gurman Files
episodes.overview: After Black Saturn resigns from the League, he takes on his first solo case: a string of kidnappings, all women who used to model for a famed '70s photographer. As Saturn tries to track down the photog, Titanium Rex's old secret identity comes back to haunt him.

episodes.name: We Need to Talk about Liplor
episodes.overview: After years of searching, Rex's brother, Titanium Dax, becomes the second Subtopian ever to breach Earth's surface. He and his rock monster slave, Liplor, are thrilled to find Rex alive, but their reunion is soured when Dax threatens to reveal a secret about Rex's origins.

episodes.name: Logs Day Journey Into Night
episodes.overview: To protect the League, Rex has gone into hiding, working as a lumberjack far from civilization. While Rex tries to cope with his new identity as a regular joe, Robobot attempts to get a downtrodden League of Freedom back together to take on a dire threat to Storm City.

episodes.name: Titanium Lex
episodes.overview: With the Suptopian army enslaving Earth, the League and the supervillains find themselves in a peculiar quandary.

episodes.name: Home Is Where The Shart Is
episodes.overview: After helping the League of Freedom save the world, Dr. Devizo and his team of villains move into the Mansion as bona fide heroes. The team struggles with their new roommates as Robobot travels across the country in search of the elusive Swine Kampf.

episodes.name: Masters of Lex
episodes.overview: Lex starts a romance with the rogue vigilante Max Penalizer, so Titanium Rex teams with Dr. Devizo on a mission to break the couple apart.

episodes.name: My Cousin Kitty
episodes.overview: Claudette, Cooch's former owner, returns with a lawyer seeking to get her cat back, so Robobot agrees to represent Rex in the upcoming trial; the Groaner tries to discern the true meaning behind Black Saturn's name.

episodes.name: Iliga of Their Own
episodes.overview: When the supervillains move out of the mansion and steal half the furniture, the League takes a trip to Swedish furniture store ILEGA; feeling stung by the Groaner's absence, Saturn finds a rebound nemesis in Bugula.

episodes.name: Back in Black to the Future
A Prayer for Mr. T: The SuperMansion Thanksgiving Special
World War Tree - Earth Day Special

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: A group of irrelevant superheroes struggle to remain significant in the modern era.
